id: Control Your Wealth | Personal Finance & Investing Guide (Notion)
name: Control Your Wealth | Personal Finance & Investing Guide (Notion)
description: If you want... ✅ Financial Freedom✅ To escape your 9-5✅ Or, to simply get a better grip on your financesBut you're not sure where or how to start...This is for you!You can have all those things you seek:✅ Time Freedom✅ Location Freedom✅ Financial FreedomWhen you're done reading this, you'll: Know how to get a grip on your financial situation Know exactly how much you need to be financially free and how long it will take Be equipped with the knowledge on how to achieve that goal through investing
features: Know how to get a grip on your financial situation; Know exactly how much you need to be financially free and how long it will take; Be equipped with the knowledge on how to achieve that goal through investing; Organize your finances; Monitor your investments; Find out exactly how much you need to be financially free; Track your goals
